skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy 3 times. Has a 15% chance of placing a 100% [Heal Reduction] debuff for 2 turns.

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Has an 80% chance of stealing 2 random buff from the target. Has an 80% chance of placing a [Stun] debuff for 1 turn instead if the target has no active buffs.
skills.name: Robber's Tale

Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
